parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency code must match currency_pair base

parameters.name: side
parameters.description: Whether order is buy or sell

parameters.name: volume
parameters.description: Amount of base asset to trade

response_fields.name: trading.limit_order_min_btc_usd
response_fields.description: Minimum order size for BTC/USD pair

response_fields.name: trading.limit_order_min_eth_usd
response_fields.description: Minimum order size for ETH/USD pair

response_fields.name: trading.limit_order_min_eth_btc
response_fields.description: Minimum order size for ETH/BTC pair
